summary: Texture replacer of the Imperial Helmet. (heavy armor - fullhelmet.dds)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/8717-1-1328891993.jpg[/img]
This replaces the old Imperial Helmet with a new, imho better looking one.
[center]I doubled the resolution from 512 to 1024, tweaked the noisy texture, improved the normalmap and replaced the black fur with a red one.
The helm is not  included in the new high res dlc from Bethesda!

If you dont have the helmet you can get it with console: \"player.additem 9610d 1\"[/center]
author: Paddyy
